short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Listen to KVRX with the click of a button!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Struggle with .PLS files on a Mac, or don't want to keep a tab open on a PC? Now, you can listen to KVRX through a simple Chrome extension. Just install and press "Listen Now" to hear your favorite independent music authority.
